This is a new encode of the final MPEG-2/AC3 8-part fanedit Athena and Helo from the new Battlestar Galactica (2003-2009). The v2 fanedits were:
version2 Handbrake0.9.8 28.4GB
V: CRF21.5 8703-15565Kbps AVC - A: 5.1 448Kbps AC3

This new version3 was 2-pass encoded instead of using constant quality and the results are much smaller files with no discernible visual or audible differences. Stills and video sections were carefully evaluated during the review but if *any* issue is detected please leave a comment with the filename and timecode describing the issue so it can be addressed as soon as possible.

Why download this FANEDIT? Because you like ...
1. Grace Park or Tahmoh Penikett
2. the characters Athena or Helo
3. Battlestar Galactica 2003-2009 and you want to watch a FANEDIT
4. Athena.and.Helo.v01 and want to see a better, updated version that's also much smaller
5. You already have Athena.and.Helo.v2 and want to save 20GB of space

Athena.and.Helo.v3 is a 1080p video, 5.1 surround sound audio TRUE FANEDIT of Battlestar Galactica 2003-2009 that includes all of Athena's story and her relationship with Helo. Some Helo material is included that doesn't directly relate to Athena, for example Helo's time with Boomer in the miniseries and most of The Woman King story. All scenes where Athena has a line and almost every frame of when Athena was on screen is included. Additionally, Athena.and.Helo.v3 includes all non-Boomer Eights that are on the Galactica or around Helo, e.g. Rebel Eight from The Hub, the construction worker Eights, etc. This began as an edit with every Battlestar Galactica scene Grace Park was in and developed into Athena.and.Helo and Boomer.and.Chief. There is a standalone release for The Face Of The Enemy webisodes. Compared to Athena.and.Helo.v01, Athena.and.Helo.v2 is much more carefully edited, has fewer editing and encoding errors and the video and audio quality are better with v2. Athena.and.Helo.v3 has the same content as v2 but is 20GB smaller in size with no discernible visual or audible differences.

Athena.and.Helo.v3 Content Notes:
* As many special effects scenes were kept as possible, especially space battles and Cylon Centurions
* Some scenes just include Athena's part without telling the story of the whole episode, e.g. The Farm, Scar, The Passage, others
* Scenes without Athena and Helo but with important Athena or Athena and Helo discussions were included, e.g. between Adama and Roslin or Adama and Tigh
* Deleted scenes with Athena were integrated, even scenes that are short or do not add much to the story
* Opening credit graphics may appear throughout the Athena.and.Helo.v3 episodes
* scenes are in order except for the dream sequences from Crossroads1 and Crossroads2 at the end of season 3 which are consolidated and Helo's "there's a storm coming" clip is last for season 3
* Athena and Chief's talk and Helo and Chief's talk while Chief was in the brig are slightly reordered
